name: Welcome Home 2
description:
David is trapped in his grandmother's basement, help him escape!

Gameplay

Welcome Home 2 is a survival horror with heavy atmospheric and puzzle elements. Help David fight off strange monsters as he navigates liminal spaces in a maze-like dream. There are plenty of secrets that will test the player's ability to think outside the box.

The game features an original soundtrack created by Josh Cominelli.
Warning for flashing images and disturbing imagery.
Playtime is about 2 to 3 hours and more content updates are planned for the near future!

Credits

Will Burke (Art/animation, Programming, Sound Design, Writing/Story)

Josh Cominelli (Music, Sound Design)
Hunter Welch (Art/Animation, Sound Design)
